WorkItem.Description:
I am able to load all my other toons from the armory but can not load either of my hunters into Rawr.  I get the following error when I try:
Â 
*****************************
Step Name: Get Character
Description: Rawr encountered an error retrieving the Character - Jameslock@US-Cenarion Circle from the armory
The given key was not present in the dictionary.
   at System.ThrowHelper.ThrowKeyNotFoundException()
   at System.Collections.Generic.SortedList`2.get_Item(TKey key)
   at Rawr.Armory.ApplyRacialandProfessionBuffs(XmlDocument doc, Character character)
   at Rawr.Armory.GetCharacter(CharacterRegion region, String realm, String name, String[]& itemsOnCharacter)

Comments.Message: Please, learn to read the release notes.  Or, do a search for the issue.  Both would have let you know that the Hunter model for 3.1 is not implemented in 2.2.0.8.

Ok I was actually going to make a post asking how long we should expect till the new hunter talent trees are implemented. I know that they aren't updated in 2.2.0.8, but just curious about a possible fix date?
As I understand it, it will be once a potential developer volunteers for the project.  No developer > no results.  *shrug*
I am seeing the same problem with Smokewolf on the Silvermoon server. Cant get the charater downloaded and during start up RAWR is sluggish.
